committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Fort Totten National Historic Site.
short_title: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act

summary.text: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to acquire the lands and establish the Fort Totten National Historic Site, North Dakota. Requires the Secretary to submit a general management plan for such Site within two years to specified congressional committees. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Fort Totten National Historic Site Act
A bill to authorize the establishment of the Fort Totten National Historic Site.
